model.entity

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.entity.Entity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEntity, ISerializable, java.io.Serializable 

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEntity
    Implementation of an IEntity.

    This implementation uses Java's UUID to generate unique IDs.

    Author:
    Rhondu Smithwick
    See Also:
